gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 104, Hornets 91
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Hornets, 104-91. Coby White led the Bulls with 22 points, 10 rebounds, and six assists, with DeMar DeRozan adding 17 points and six assists in the victory. Miles Bridges tallied 28 points, five rebounds, and two assists for the Hornets in the defeat. The Bulls improve to 16-21 in the regular season, while the Hornets fall to 8-25.
